General.Name: Robinson plc
General.Description: Robinson plc engages in the manufacture and sale of plastic and paperboard packaging products in the United Kingdom, Poland, Denmark, and internationally. It provides various plastic packaging products comprising HDPE and PP bottles, and PET bottles; pots, tubs, and containers; caps, closures, and over caps; and various jars. The company also offers paper packaging products, including shoulder boxes, boxes and lids, book jackets, clam packs, rigid trays and sleeves, and folding cartons. It offers its products for the food and drink, personal care and beauty, luxury gifting, and homecare markets. The company was founded in 1839 and is headquartered in Chesterfield, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Field House, Chesterfield, United Kingdom, S40 2AB
